sentences.english: Chinese Society of Clinical Oncology, Chinese Anti-Cancer Association.
sentences.chinese: 中国抗癌协会临床肿瘤学协作专业委员会。

sentences.english: All pelvic exenteration surgery was performed by the same gynecological oncologist.
sentences.chinese: 由同样的妇科肿瘤学专家施行盆腔清扫术。

sentences.english: He was one of the founders of oncological research in china.
sentences.chinese: 他是中国肿瘤学研究的创始人。

sentences.english: The oncologist invented a new kind of interferon to prevent cancer.
sentences.chinese: 那位肿瘤学家发明了一种可以预防癌症的干扰素。

sentences.english: The oncologic benefit was primarily in patients with organ confined disease.
sentences.chinese: 肿瘤学的好处主要是器官局限性疾病的患者。

sentences.english: Others become oncologists and treat cancer patients.
sentences.chinese: 其他的变成了肿瘤学医师和治疗癌患病人。

sentences.english: The report appears in the September issue of The Lancet Oncology.
sentences.chinese: 报告刊登在柳叶刀肿瘤学9月号上。

sentences.english: The lymph node mapping(LNM)is a new hot spot of oncology and surgery in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 淋巴结显像技术是肿瘤学和外科学研究的新热点。

sentences.english: In China, curriculum arrangement and teaching of oncology program at medical colleges and universities lag behind those of other majors.
sentences.chinese: 在我国，医学院校肿瘤学课程设置及教学相对滞后。

sentences.english: The development of oncology is always following the anti-tumor new-medicine research and the clinical trial.
sentences.chinese: 肿瘤学的发展一直伴随抗肿瘤新药的研发与临床试验。

sentences.english: Maura Gillison, a professor of oncology and epidemiology, said in a telephone interview.
sentences.chinese: 他是一名肿瘤学和流行病学的教授。

pinyin: duo1 fa1 xing4 gu3 sui3 liu2
